## pad() function

Left pad another value with zero if its less then the given length.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pad(value: string | number | undefined, length: number): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| number \| undefined |  |
|  length | number |  |

**Returns:**
